author: China Insights-SOHTV
description:
They called him a nobody.
Just a junior assistant judge in a Beijing court. No fame. No power. No voice.

Until he leaked the receipts—and the CCP couldn’t spin fast enough.

Bai Bin didn’t just vanish. He dropped a digital time bomb exposing high-level corruption, fake case files, and an internal money shuffle worth millions. The state media said he ran off with the cash. He says he followed orders from above—and kept the receipts.

So, who’s lying?

In this video, we break down the twisted plot behind China’s latest judicial “heist,” how a low-level court clerk may have outsmarted the entire system, and why the regime’s biggest fear is always the same: truth from the bottom.

🎯 A petty official just punched a hole in the CCP’s perfect storybook.
👀 Stick around. The system’s cracks are getting harder to hide.
title: Tiny Clerk, Big Slap: One Nobody Just Shut the CCP Up
